ProductInfo.Features:
THL W8S: Android 4.2.1 OS + 1.5GHz MTK6589T Cortex-A7 Quad-core CPU + 2GB RAM + 32GB ROM, 5.0" large 5-point-touch IPS-LCD Corning Gorilla Glass 3 + 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD screen resolution
Up to 1080P FHD resolution for horizontal/vertical auto-switchingly visual enjoyment Panorama shooting/Face detection/Auto-focus cameras support up to 13 MP photo output & 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD camcorder capability
Supports Android Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted, WiFi + Play Store + Bluetooth 4.0 + FM + Ebook + Email + Gmail + Messaging + Wallpapers + Calendar + Calculator + Clock + Alarm + World Clock + Tasks + Camera + VPN + Tethering & Portable Hotspot
Supports APK format Android game and applications, such as Angry Birds, Tomcat and etc
Works with 3G(850/2100MHz) & 2G(850/900/1800/1900MHZ) networks
ProductInfo.Name: THL W8+ 5.0" Gorilla Glass 3 1.5GHz MTK6589T Android 4.2.1 Bluetooth 4.0 Cell Phone IPS + 13MP CAM 2GB RAM + 32GB ROM
